footer.credits: Templum orbitale artificium est ab Edson Pavoni, in collaboratione cum Pedro Kaled, João Pedro Polito, Victor Baptista & João Victor Alves, André Biagioni, VK, Jonathan Querubina, Guilherme Bullejos, Eduardo Dias, Roberta Savian Rosa, Clara Marques, Sathi Roy, et omnes qui pergunt nomina huic templo mittere.
